evaluation-1-customer-text: The meat is fresh and just right. Surveyor carefully read the remarks, the work is in place.
evaluation-2-customer-text: Quickly put the little brother service in place, I fill in the wrong address, the little brother phone contact soon to me. Thank you very much!
evaluation-3-customer-text: So night, brother hard, fast delivery. Thank you
evaluation-4-customer-text: This apple is better than Aksu in New Zealand! Crispy and sweet! The ugliest apple I've ever seen and the best apple I've ever eaten
